analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x44bec8dbb6ec77f49be36aef8dadefd2f78d9977.sol:
	Contract Centhereum has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x44bec8dbb6ec77f49be36aef8dadefd2f78d9977.sol#208)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x44bec8dbb6ec77f49be36aef8dadefd2f78d9977.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0x44bec8dbb6ec77f49be36aef8dadefd2f78d9977.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x44bec8dbb6ec77f49be36aef8dadefd2f78d9977.sol#83) is not in mixedCase
